sentences.english: He who does good comes to the temple gate, he who loves reaches the shrine.
sentences.chinese: 行善的人來到廟門口，兼愛的人走進大殿堂。

sentences.english: So that day she went on her errand of mercy, and knocked at the door of Toad’s cell.
sentences.chinese: 於是有一天，她就敲開蟾蜍囚室的門，去做行善的事。

sentences.english: A truly charitable person will perform charitable deeds without the thought of getting name or rewards.
sentences.chinese: 真正佈施行善的人不要名利，也不求福報。

sentences.english: We would not recognize the do-gooding, thigh-slapping, quick-trading gentleman-archer we know from fiction.
sentences.chinese: 小說中我們不會看到那個行善的弓箭手。

sentences.english: There's something I call the 21-day kindness challenge.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個說法是21天行善挑戰。

sentences.english: He helped the poor and rescued those in danger. He enjoyed doing good, and in particular, he never liked to kill anything.
sentences.chinese: 他濟貧並救人於危難，喜歡行善，特別是從不殺生。

sentences.english: The righteous is not innocent of the deeds of the wicked
sentences.chinese: 行善守法者在惡人惡行中並非純潔無邪。

sentences.english: For there is not a just man upon earth, that doeth good, and sinneth not.
sentences.chinese: 時常行善而不犯罪的義人，世上實在沒有。

sentences.english: For [it is] better, if the will of God be so, that ye suffer for well doing, than for evil doing.
sentences.chinese: 神的旨意若叫你們因行善受苦，總強如因行惡受苦。

sentences.english: The idea, then as now, in the rabbinic tradition, was that a man obtained righteousness through good works.
sentences.chinese: 猶太拉比的傳統認爲一個人要藉著行善才能得義。

sentences.english: Rich people to do good, not the old Chizhai Buddhism, loaded to be good people.
sentences.chinese: 有錢人多行善，不要老喫齋唸佛，裝做好人。

sentences.english: His desire to do good is overwhelming him.
sentences.chinese: 他無法抗拒自己想行善的願望。

sentences.english: The mercy of God is near.
sentences.chinese: 真主的慈恩確是臨近行善者的。

sentences.english: All people who live good lives, no matter what their religion, have a place in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 一切行善之人，不論秉持何種信仰，皆於天堂有份。

sentences.english: But ye, brethren, be not weary in well doing.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄們，你們行善不可喪志。

sentences.english: Some people or other had clothed him in rags out of charity.
sentences.chinese: 一些不相干的人由於行善讓他穿上那樣的破衣爛衫。
